about_the_game:
Step into the shoes of the Angel Raphael in this immersive and action packed first-person dungeon crawler. Travel through 24 floors, each presenting a new challenge to overcome with new demons to fight.

Engage in intense combat against a variety of demonic enemies, with the strategy and strength behind them increasing with each new floor. Uncover hidden side quests that offer new power to destroy anything in your path.


  • Master the drain combat system!
  • Take on loads of demon side quests to get new armor, weapons, and skills!
  • Travel the 24 floors and discover all the hidden secrets!
  • Fight against 157 unique enemies and bosses!
  • 10-20 hours worth of gameplay.

Will you rise to the challenge and defeat Asmodeus?

name: The Legend of Azarias Rebirth Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Embark on a thrilling journey as the Angel Raphael in this action packed 3D first-person dungeon crawler. Conquer 24 unique floors, battle menacing demons, and undertake challenging side quests to amass power to save the girl Sarah.
